alert.note: Alert for Burke; Divide (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 6:00PM CDT until July 02 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Burke County in northwestern North Dakota... Northeastern Divide County in northwestern North Dakota... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 600 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Noonan, or 13 miles southeast of Crosby, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of Burke and northeastern Divide Counties, including the following locations... Larson and Northgate. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
